website_summaries.verdict: A user-friendly, beginner-friendly ninja obstacle course that sets itself apart with a comprehensive guide.
pros: Instructional book makes it easy to set up the hanging ninja course in a short amount of time
Comes with a large climbing ladder and several hanging obstacles
Can be used as slack line
cons: The slack line has less tension when fully set up than other ninja backyard obstacle kits

customer_reviews.title: Less than a month later...broken
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it for less than a month and it broke while my child was playing on it. I’m so lucky he wasn’t hurt. He is about 4’ and weighs about 65 pounds. I would expect these rings to be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: ak40sushi

customer_reviews.title: Poorly crafted metal rings. Don’t buy. Potential injuries.
customer_reviews.text: This is a potentially dangerous product. The metal rings that connect the webbing are all poorly welded and will fail under the stress of making the line tight. I have had 5 rings fail so far. Luckily the kids were close to the ground each time and we have just gotten used to them failing. We wouldn’t be using the product, but since we’re in the Covid19 lockdown, we’re short on options. I’ve been replacing the metal rings with climbing carabiners that I have. I wouldn’t buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Can't keep the kids off it!
customer_reviews.text: This obstacle course is made of sturdy, quality materials and was easy to put up between two trees in our backyard. Our kids (girls ages 6, 4, and 2) love it so much that they ask to go play on it before they even eat breakfast! They are inspired by American Ninja Warrior, Jessie Graff, and this set allows them to imagine being just like her. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: EFV

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product to give your kids hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: High-quality product, easy to install, and hours of fun! Purchased this for 9 year-olds. The product is very sturdy and was not too difficult to set up. It offers lots of flexibility to switch out the hanging devices to make it easier / harder depending on preference. Such a great idea and opportunity to leverage trees in your backyard!
customer_reviews.author: G. Kallos

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Set this up in about 30 minutes. My family is very active really wanted something new for the backyard. I really love the the handholds range from easy to pretty hard. (7, 10 and 11 year old). One hand hold broke and was replaced in about 48 hours. Great, friendly guy who responds quickly by direct email.
customer_reviews.author: E. Viray

customer_reviews.title: Great product, amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.text: What a cool product! The company gives perhaps the best customer service for any seller on Amazon. Great how to instructions before the product arrived, cool design. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tcundiff

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids 8 and 6 yrs old love this course
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids 8 and 6 yrs old love this course, they played on it until their hands hurt! We set it up in our barn, so they can play year round. They were unable to hold onto the knots, I notified the seller, he immediately replied and sent me easier attachments. He is the best! I highly recommend this course. Outstanding customer service and product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but need trees or something sturdy to hang it
customer_reviews.text: Fun thing, but might not work well for a child that is too heavy. You have to tighten the unit between two trees or something similar and it would have to be very tight to withstand a person's weight. Also has to be set up fairly high depending on user's weight. Can add different elements to the line to change its pattern
customer_reviews.author: Terry D

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This was great fun for my 5 year old right up until the metal broke and she fell off. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: The ring separated while my kids were using it. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper43

customer_reviews.title: Metal rings connecting rope sections snap open
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use, a metal ring snapped and line broke while my 50lb kid was hanging on the ninja line. I got a replacement and the same thing happened with the second line- metal ring snapped at the seam first day using this line. We were lucky he fell on his butt and did not get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Roemischer

customer_reviews.title: A lot problems
customer_reviews.text: Terrible and insufficient instructions. Should come with a complete set of obstacles instead of leaving four open spots to have you buy more. Extremely difficult to get the clips through the loops to hang everything on the line. Recommended height was way off per their guidelines. I had to make many adjustments time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Faulty hardware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ninja line less than a year ago. My son enjoyed it until last night when one of the o-rings snapped when he was on it, he landed on his back and hit his head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item and fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: What! What customer service. I’m a dummy and didn’t know how to use a ratchet, but Adam quickly helped me over email. I’m so exited to get everything hung, and see my kiddos’ excitement!
customer_reviews.author: julesann

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our little ninjas are loving their new obstacle course! It is well-made and very easy to set up, even for just one person.
customer_reviews.author: EllyseB

customer_reviews.title: For a little older than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Very good thing. But your kids has to be over 6-7 to be able fully enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Obstacle course design. I tried to buy more rings for my younger kids to use as they are easier then the ropes and monkey bars and the seller sent me some for free. Awesome Seller! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: How do I contact the company?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 8 months ago for my daughter’s birthday. She used it yesterday and the wooden bar broke and she fell, similarly to another review. Who should I contact please?it says a lifetime warranty on all parts
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mumby

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Our kids spent hours on this playing in the backyard! High quality. Would recommend to anyone. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McNeely

product_meta.title: Backyard Ninja Backyard 45 Foot Ninja Obstacle Course | Inspired by American Ninja Warrior Training Equipment | Slackline Swinging Monkey Bars Includes 9 Hanging Obstacles for Kids with Ladder
product_meta.description:
BACKYARD NINJA IS A LIFESTYLE 


Backyard Ninja wants to bring back yard fun back with our portable ninja warrior training course! Easy and convenient to set up our obstacle course includes a sturdy 45 foot webbed slackline with woven slits to add obstacles too. Gradually increase spaces between obstacles to increase difficulty. Includes 3 monkey first to improve grip strength, 2 strong trapeze bars, 3 rubber coated gymnastic rings. Perfect for all ages! Kids will love it just as much as you will, rather your training for a ninja competition or a future Jr ninja warrior of America. 


Includes 

8 customizable obstacles 
Carrying/storage bag for convenient portability 
Second carrying case for obstacles 
45 foot sturdy webbed slackline 
3 rubber coated gymnastic rings 
3 textured monkey fist that will improve grip strength 
2 Stong wooden trapeze bars Industrial strength ratchet for safety 
9 carabiners to customize obstacles 
2 red tree protectors 

What you need 

2 strong trees or post about 25- 35 feet apart apart depending on diameter of trees. 
The tree or post with ratchet will need to be a 1-2 feet wide in diameter maximum. 

Have fun! 

- Watch as you or your little ninja grows stronger and more agile. 
- train for future ninja competitions. 
- Enjoy endless backyard excitement!
feature_bullets: LIFETIME WARRENTY ! My kids love this it and I know yours will too. Because of that I offer a free lifetime warranty on all parts!

INSTRUCTIONAL eBook and SETUP REQUIREMENTS - Setup effortlessly with our instructional eBook that you will receive with each order. Our 45 foot heavy duty slackline webbing includes a sturdy steel ratchet for secure fastening between 2 trees or post roughly 25-35 feet apart. The tree or post with ratchet will need to be a 1-2 feet wide in diameter maximum.
SLACKLINE ! - Backyard Ninja doubles as a traditional slackline that will improve balance and core strength
SAFETY FEATURES - Tested to hold up to 165 lb | Parental supervision Required. Rubber coated gymnastic ring, and industrial strength ratchet for max security.
BACKYARD NINJA WARRIOR FUN WITH LADDER ! - Enjoy countless hours of fun with our 45 foot portable obstacle course with 8 customizable features

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars35 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
